title: If I'm being honest, this game is just not even a little fun anymore
body:
Every single game (after it takes 40 min to get in, and you'll always get your secondary role) you get relentless trolls/afks/ragers. If you arent losing because some spoiled child made it their mission to ruin the game, or someone went afk, then you're getting yelled at for 40 min. 
Winning is no better, because its the same situation. You just snowball and win by a landslide because the enemy got trolled or had an afk, and there was no challenge. 

I haven't played a single game this season that was a fun, close game that was challenging and engaging without making me want to boil my face in hot sauce afterwards. 

I'm not even mentioning the slew of critical ban champs that rape face and ruin games, or the horrible balance, or the multitude of issues with dynamic queue, or any of the other torturous things this season, because at the end of the day all that matters is whether its fun or not, and now, it just is not even a little fun.

If it's not fun anymore than stop playing. Taking a break is one of the best things you can do instead of forcing yourself to sit through annoying games. Trolls, ragers, and afkers have always been there. There has always been people who flame in games. It's not the fact that the game is getting worse, it's just that you need a break. The best thing I've done was take a break for about 1.5 months at the start of preseason to refuel my interest back in league.

Take that break, and your interest in the game will come back. Until then, stop wasting your time in games you seem to be having no fun in.

The whole ban phase gets whacked just from 1 or 2 champs getting ridiculous buffs and the 6 champs you were banning last week still didn't get balanced. I seriously feel like I have to relearn the whole damn game relearn a new champ or team comp based on design choices by the balance team more than just learning a champ and getting good with them.

It's worse now than it has ever been; and not just the toxicity, but the game play has been going backwards. Balance is atrocious at the moment, and if you can actually get a game which doesn't have "1st time Syndra ranked k" or just whacked meta picks like Ashe jungle then count yourself lucky. I honestly haven't seen this much crap ever in League.

And I have felt the urge myself as well to be a dick. After bad games with trolls, you want nothing more than to say FUCK THIS GAME and queue up and just troll yourself. The game has become a mecca for trolling and flaming to the point that it's basically accepted. In what game should you just accept being told you're a piece of shit and I wish you had cancer and you should die? I honestly NEVER experienced that shit until the start of Season 5 ( been playing since season 3). The solution of " report and move on " doesn't even do anything. 99% of the time you never hear about them being banned, and since you honestly have a troll in 4/5 games, your reports carry no merit since you are reporting all the time. Also, what's the point of reporting anyway? Your games done, you lost, there is a good chance you may NEVER interact with that player again; the damage has already been done.

I took a 2 month break from League from September to November because I was away on work; when I came back I was actually looking forward to play again; just to realize the game has only gotten worse. At the moment, I might play 2 games a week; I read and watch League now more than I play.

Give me a time in League when balance was not a problem? I think you'd have a hard time finding it. The thing about a game like this is that it constantly has to be balanced. Champion, game, and item changes have effects that are unpredictable. It's a butterfly effect.

Trolls and AFKers have always been in this game as well. I honestly don't know what makes people think that this season magically has 10x as many trolls as the previous. It's all in the head. It's the same reason we constantly see threads come out like "This season is BY FAR the worst," when it simply is not true. People love to think every other season in league has been happy go lucky and 100% balanced and fun and somehow it's worse now than it ever was. News flash: trolls, balance issues, AFKers, assholes never **_never_** go away, and they are no worse than any previous season.
